tech-stack-detection.instructions:
Analyze the project documentation below and identify ALL tech stacks used.
Return ONLY a comma-separated list of stack identifiers from this exact set: python, javascript, go, java, rust, ruby, csharp, cpp, swift
Rules: - TypeScript, React, Vue, Svelte, Next.js, Node.js → "javascript" - Django, Flask, FastAPI, Celery → "python" - Gin, Echo, Fiber → "go" - Spring Boot, Kotlin → "java" - .NET, ASP.NET → "csharp" - Include ALL stacks mentioned, even secondary ones (e.g. SQL scripts, migration tools) - If the project uses a database via an ORM, do NOT add a separate stack for SQL - If unsure about a technology, omit it - Do NOT include frameworks as separate stacks — map them to their language - Do NOT add any explanation, markdown, or extra text
Example outputs: python, javascript go javascript, python, java
